name: mca-eddystone-beacon-scanner
description: Eddystone Beacon Scanner which is kind of hybrid apps, is made up of Web Technologies like Mobile Chrome Apps and Polymer Starter Kit

scripts.postinstall: cd src; npm install && bower install; gf-import ./bower_components/font-roboto/roboto.html --html=./bower_components/font-roboto/
scripts.config: cd platform; cordova-config set name "$NAME"; cordova-config set id $ID
scripts.build: npm run build:app; cd ./platform; cca build $PLATFORM
scripts.package: mkdir -p package/chrome; cd ./platform/www/; nodezip -c ../../package/chrome/chrome-app.zip .;mkdir -p package/chrome; cd ..; pwd; cp -r ./platforms/android/build/outputs/apk ../package/android
